channel.title: Problem starting server
channel.description:
When I go to start my server i get this [code]:~#sh run.sh :command not found Exception in thread "main" java.awt.HeadlessException: No X11 DISPLAY variable was set, but this program performed an operation which requires it. at java.awt.GraphicsEnviroment.checkHeadless(GraphicsEnvironment.java:159) at java.awt.Window.<init>(Window.java:432) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:202) at ServerGUI.<init>(server.java:13)[/code]
What do?

item.title: Problem starting server
item.dc:creator: @mort21 mort21
item.description:
@mort21 wrote:

tried that and got

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at ServerGUI.addConsole(ServerGUI.java:63) at Misc.printlnTag(Misc.java:44) at Server.run(Server.java:98) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at ServerGUI.updateUserList(ServerGUI.java:82) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:139) at Server.main(Server.java:30)

Read full topic

item.title: Problem starting server
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

mort21:

That would be awesome but I don’t know how

Remove/comment out anything to do with the GUI. A smarter approach would be a web interface if you really want a control panel you can access

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mort21 mort21
item.description:
@mort21 wrote:

That would be awesome but I don’t know how

item.title: Problem starting server
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You are trying to start a GUI on a server that doesn’t have a window manager. Disable/remove it

Read full topic
